Class PoolSupervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.PoolsController
      • controllers.PoolSupervisor

  • public class PoolSupervisor
extends PoolsController
    This class define and control the structure that contains all the supervisors in the bank.

        This method verify if are available supervisors
        Specified by:
        areEmployeesAvailables in class PoolsController
        Returns:
